delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Dot {{ id }}?

help.timestamp: Moment at which the dot was captured
help.x: Position of dot in X axis
help.y: Position of dot in Y axis
help.tiltX: Tilt of the pen in X axis
help.tiltY: Tilt of the pen in Y axis
help.pressure: Pressure applied to the pen tip
